---
title: "Fancybox Test"
format:
  html:
    css:
      - https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@fancyapps/[email protected]/dist/fancybox/fancybox.css
    includes:
      in-header: |
        <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@fancyapps/[email protected]/dist/fancybox/fancybox.umd.js"></script>
        <script>
          document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
            if (window.Fancybox) {
              Fancybox.bind("[data-fancybox]", {
                Thumbs: false,
                Toolbar: true
              });
              console.log("✅ Fancybox initialized.");
            } else {
              console.error("❌ Fancybox failed to load.");
            }
          });
        </script>
